import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { productService, userService, orderService, categoryService } from '../../../data/database'; import './AdminReports.css'; const AdminReports = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalProducts: 0, totalUsers: 0, totalOrders: 0, totalRevenue: 0, averageOrderValue: 0, criticalProducts: 0, totalCategories: 0 }); useEffect(() => { // Verificar si el usuario est치 logueado y es admin const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || 'null'); if (!user || user.role !== 'admin') { navigate('/login'); return; } // Calcular estad칤sticas const allProducts = productService.getAll(); const allUsers = userService.getAll(); const allOrders = orderService.getAll(); const allCategories = categoryService.getAll(); const criticalProducts = productService.getCriticalProducts(15); const totalRevenue = allOrders.reduce((sum, order) => sum + order.total, 0); const averageOrderValue = allOrders.length > 0 ? totalRevenue / allOrders.length : 0; setStats({ totalProducts: allProducts.length, totalUsers: allUsers.length, totalOrders: allOrders.length, totalRevenue: totalRevenue, averageOrderValue: averageOrderValue, criticalProducts: criticalProducts.length, totalCategories: allCategories.length }); }, [navigate]); return (

Resumen General
  • Valor Promedio de Orden: ${stats.averageOrderValue.toFixed(2)}
  • Productos Cr칤ticos: {stats.criticalProducts}
  • Categor칤as: {stats.totalCategories}
Acciones R치pidas
Ver Productos Cr칤ticos Gestionar Categor칤as Ver Todas las 칍rdenes
); }; export default AdminReports;
